gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all issue types available in Jira so that I can understand the different categories of issues we can create.
gold.ideal: The response should include a list of all issue types with their respective IDs, names, and descriptions.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new issue type for our project to better categorize our tasks.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the creation of the new issue type and return its ID, name, and description.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to see the issue types available for my specific project so that I can select the appropriate type when creating issues.
gold.ideal: The response should list all issue types associated with the specified project, including their IDs and names.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to delete an obsolete issue type from our Jira instance to keep our issue types organized.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the issue type and return a success message.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to retrieve details of a specific issue type to ensure it meets our project requirements.
gold.ideal: The response should include the ID, name, description, and any associated fields of the specified issue type.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to update the name and description of an existing issue type to reflect recent changes in our workflow.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated issue type details.

gold.user: As a product owner, I want to see alternative issue types for a specific issue type to explore options for categorizing our tasks.
gold.ideal: The response should list alternative issue types with their IDs and names that can be used instead of the specified issue type.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to upload an avatar for a specific issue type to enhance its visual representation in the project.
